name: VCP Events
author: Kyle Peeters

sections.description:
For the best in interactive web events such as webinars and live streaming shows, this plugin will let you embed videos with a responsive Google+ comment stream attached to it that’s live – before, during, and after events.. You can add custom branding, descriptions, titles, and the plugin even gives you a way to display and discuss audience comments, taking engagement to a whole new level, where the audience becomes part of the live conversation.

Tutorial

Features

YouTube Live Stream Embed
Google Comment Stream Embed
Adjustable size ratio of video to comments
Responsive interactivity
Selective Google Fonts for comments
Multiple font size options per comment
Custom backgrounds for comments
Custom Branding option
Option to feature trailer video
Add event details and content / links
Comment Stream available live from time of event posting
sections.installation:
1. Upload VCP-Events to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  3. Start using the plugin by creating a new VCP post.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload VCP-Events to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  3. Start using the plugin by creating a new VCP post.

Can I embed videos from places other than youtube?

Yes. Anywhere you can get an embeded link from.

Where can I find basic instructions or a tutorial?

Simply create a new VCP post from the admin panel, and the default video will be a tutorial video on how to use the plugin.

Can I move my chat stream to another page?

Unfortunately no. Google+ links the url of the page to the chat, so changing the url will use a different chat stream
